item.title: Ethan Slater Played A Very Different Wicked Character Than Boq Many Years Ago
item.description: In 2024â€™s Wicked, Ethan Slater plays the optimistic Munchkin, Boq, yet many years prior, the actor took on a much different Wicked role.

item.title: Rachel Zegler Reunites With Hunger Games Co-Star In Sweet Photos One Year After Prequel's Release
item.description: Rachel Zegler and Tom Blyth reunite at her Broadway show Romeo + Juliet, a year after starring in The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes.

item.title: OK Marvel, I'm Starting To See How Sam Wilson's Captain America Can Take On Red Hulk After Seeing His New Power
item.description: On the surface, Captain America vs Red Hulk feels like a very uneven match-up, but I'm starting to see how the MCU intends to even the odds.
